attributes.action: Introduce a system whereby physically fit unemployment benefit claimants have to earn it!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please sign this petition if you are as fed up of seeing our unemployed youngsters drinking alcohol in the streets as I am instead of looking for gainful employment. They could be better employed keeping the streets clean & removing graffiti etc.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=state+benefit
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
